name: Tier 1 Spell Critical Hits (Levels 1-4)
description: Critical hit effects for spell attacks at Tier 1 (Levels 1-4). Effects are relatively mild for novice adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical spell deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Arcane Burn - Your spell leaves lingering magical energy. Target takes 1d4 force damage at the start of their next turn.
Magical Overload - The target's senses are briefly overwhelmed. They have disadvantage on their next saving throw against a spell.
Knockback - The force of your spell pushes the target. They must succeed on a DC 10 Strength save or be pushed 10 feet away from you.
Spell Feedback - Your spell disrupts the target's concentration. If concentrating, they must make a concentration save with disadvantage.
Elemental Surge - Your spell's element flares. Add 1d6 damage of the spell's damage type.
Lingering Magic - Magical energy clings to the target. They glow faintly and can't benefit from invisibility until the end of their next turn.
Perfect Casting - Your spell is cast with incredible efficiency. Regain 1 expended spell slot of 1st level (if you have any expended).
